alert.note: Alert for Hempstead; Lafayette; Little River; Miller (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 7:41AM CDT until June 13 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Little River County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Hempstead County in southwestern Arkansas... Northern Miller County in southwestern Arkansas... North central Lafayette County in southwestern Arkansas... East central Bowie County in northeastern Texas... * Until 845 AM CDT. * At 741 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hooks, or 8 miles northeast of New Boston, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Texarkana, Wake Village, New Boston, Nash, Hooks, Red Lick, Garland, Fulton, Ogden, Mandeville, Genoa, Richmond, Leary, Mount Pleasant, McNab, Millwood, Hervey, Red Bank, Spirit Lake and Homan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
